A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I feel nothing. No wait that's not true. I felt anger\, confusion\, despair and hopelessness as I left the theatre. Uncontrollable anger at those who decided to treat Luke and Leia's characters the way did in this movie. Confusion about who are we suppose to root for. Despair at the ugly and juvenile humour they out in for cheap laughs. Hopelessness that us fans has no say or power to do anything about it. Even they have the gall to deemed us bots and trolls for callling out this utter rubbish of a movie.\n\nIt's like a million voices cried out in terror and were suddenly silenced by the great evil mouse.
